strapiPost.title: Rogers Short Film Festival This Weekend
strapiPost.content:
For all you all-things-film lovers out there, the Rogers Short Film Festival is this weekend at the Victory Theatre. 

  • Line-up: There will be 33 films total and 4 different categories: Student K-12, Student Postsecondary, Amateur, Professional. The weekend will include a VIP Lounge for the filmmakers and all-access holders, a networking breakfast at Onyx, and an awards afterparty at The 120 Tapas Bar. 
  • The occasion: The festival will be Fri-Sun in downtown Rogers and will be full of screenings, networking, food, music, and entertainment. Tickets start at $15. 

See the full schedule and get tickets HERE.
